document.full_text: an iranian woman who was blinded in an acid attack said she would spare her assailant from having the same done to him if he raised 2 million euros ($2.8 million) in compensation, a newspaper reported saturday.
document.title: iran acid victim says may spare attacker from blinding
lines_and_colors: an iranian woman who was blinded in an acid attack said she would spare her assailant from having the same done to him if he raised 2 million euros ($2.8 million) in compensation, a newspaper reported saturday.
